[pause] En realidad, quizá por eso tengo que hacerlo. No solo porque puedo, sino porque—porque les debo algo. [deep pitch] Me están ofreciendo el triple de mi tarifa habitual, pero ¿sinceramente? Eso ni siquiera... Ya sé que voy a decir que sí. Tengo que hacerlo. How do you walk away from saving your own hometown?

I mean, professionally speaking, [confidently] this is exactly what I do. Seventeen companies turned around, stock prices recovered, jobs saved—I know the playbook. But this is... [trailing off] this is different. These aren't just numbers on a spreadsheet. [anxious] These are people I went to high school with, you know? Tommy Martinez probably still works the floor. Mrs. Chen from the corner store—her whole family depends on those paychecks.

[pause] Actually, maybe that's why I have to do it. Not just because I can, but because I—because I owe them something. [deep pitch] They're offering triple my usual rate, but honestly?
